title: Swoon
description: StephI’ve never been your typical girl. I didn’t grow up in a warm fuzzy family, and emotions weren’t something I needed now. Love has never been something I could wrap my mind around, so why bother? I know what I’m good at. I’m a great friend, have a passion for healing others, and a way with horses. I can be all those things at the same time without ever discussing my own feelings.Until him.LawrenceI’ve always been told I have a way with words. It’s one reason I manage the family business so well. I can wine and dine with the best of them, selling bloodlines and high-priced stallion services over a five-course dinner. I’m able to talk myself into or out of just about anything and anyone. Until her.****Young and carefree, living worlds apart, they indulged in what seemed like the perfect fling.Until Lawrence decided he wanted more.Until Steph’s careful world fell apart.Until they had to decide if love was worth the fight.
author: C.M. Foss
